name: Steampunk Gumball
description:
A 2.5D Physics-based puzzle game made for Global Game Jam 2020 with the theme 'Repair'. You bought a steampunk gumball machine, but it is broken! Fix the gumball machine the best way you can with the parts you have!

CREDITS:

Programmers: Rorazoro, Chase Grozdina

Designer: Toby Yosher

Artist: Myrtle Ross

3D Modeler: John Chubb

Project Manager: Vlad Razuvayev
